DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness AVJ-09-385 Small Vessel Everolimus Eluting Coronary Stent System ( EECSS ) ( 2.25 mm diameter stent ) treatment subject ischemic heart disease cause de novo lesion .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Evaluation XIENCE PRIME Small Vessel Everolimus Eluting Coronary Stent System Japanese Population
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject must least 20 year age . 2 . Subject legally authorize representative must provide write informed consent prior study related procedure , per site requirement . 3 . Subject must evidence myocardial ischemia ( e.g. , stable unstable angina , silent ischemia , positive functional study reversible change electrocardiogram ( ECG ) consistent ischemia ) . 4 . Subject must acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery . 5 . Subject must agree undergo protocolrequired followup procedure . 6 . Subject must agree participate clinical study period one year follow index procedure . Angiographic Inclusion Criteria 1 . One ( target ) two ( one target one nontarget ) de novo lesion different epicardial vessel . 2 . Lesion ( ) must locate major artery branch visually estimate diameter stenosis ≥ 50 % < 100 % TIMI flow ≥ 1 . 3 . Lesion ( ) must locate native coronary artery reference vessel diameter ( RVD ) visual estimation ≥ 2.25 mm < 2.5 mm . 4 . Lesion ( ) must locate native coronary artery length visual estimation ≤ 22 mm . 1 . Subject know diagnosis acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) precede index procedure ( CKMB ≥ 2 time upper limit normal ) CK CKMB return within normal limit time procedure . 2 . The subject currently experience clinical symptom consistent new onset AMI , nitrateunresponsive prolong chest pain ischemic ECG change . 3 . Subject current unstable cardiac arrhythmia associate hemodynamic instability . 4 . Subject know leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 40 % ( LVEF may obtain time index procedure value unknown necessary ) . 5 . Subject receive coronary brachytherapy epicardial vessel . 6 . Subject receive organ transplant wait list organ transplant . 7 . Subject receive schedule receive chemotherapy malignancy within 30 day prior within one year index procedure . 8 . Subject receive schedule receive plan radiotherapy chest/mediastinum . 9 . Subject receive immunosuppressant therapy know immunosuppressive autoimmune disease ( e.g . human immunodeficiency virus , systemic lupus erythematosus etc. ) . 10 . Subject receive chronic anticoagulation therapy ( e.g. , heparin , warfarin ) . 11 . Subject require Low Molecular Weight Heparin ( LMWH ) postprocedure . 12 . Subject know hypersensitivity contraindication aspirin , heparin , clopidogrel/ticlopidine , everolimus , cobalt , chromium , nickel , tungsten , acrylic fluoro polymer contrast sensitivity adequately premedicated . 13 . Elective surgery plan within 6 month procedure require discontinue either aspirin clopidogrel . 14 . Subject platelet count < 100,000 cells/mm3 > 700,000 cells/mm3 , white blood cell ( WBC ) < 3,000 cells/mm3 , document suspect liver disease ( include laboratory evidence hepatitis ) . 15 . Subject know renal insufficiency ( example limit serum creatinine level ≥ 2.0 mg/dL , dialysis ) . 16 . Subject history bleed diathesis coagulopathy refuse blood transfusion . 17 . Subject cerebrovascular accident/stroke transient ischemic neurological attack ( TIA ) within past six month . 18 . Subject significant gastrointestinal significant urinary bleed within past six month . 19 . Subject extensive peripheral vascular disease precludes safe 5 French catheter insertion . 20 . Subject medical illness ( e.g. , cancer ) know history substance abuse ( alcohol , cocaine , heroin etc . ) may cause noncompliance protocol , confound data interpretation associate limited life expectancy ( i.e. , less one year ) . 21 . Subject currently participate another clinical study yet complete primary endpoint . 22 . Pregnant nursing subject plan pregnancy period 1 year follow index procedure . Female subject childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test do within 7 day prior index procedure per site standard test* . Whether subject meet criterion ask pregnancy test decide per site standard . However , subject enrollment study allow without pregnancy test result . Angiographic Exclusion Criteria All angiographic exclusion criterion base visual estimation . 1 . Target lesion locate within arterial saphenous vein graft distal diseased ( vessel irregularity per angiogram > 20 % stenosed lesion ) arterial saphenous vein graft . 2 . Target lesion involve bifurcation side branch ≥ 2 mm diameter and/or ostial lesion > 40 % stenosed side branch require protection guidewire , side branch require dilatation . 3 . Target lesion total occlusion ( TIMI flow 0 ) , prior cross wire . 4 . Another lesion require revascularization locate epicardial vessel target lesion . 5 . Restenotic lesion . 6 . Aortoostial target lesion ( within 3 mm aorta junction ) . 7 . Lesion leave main trunk ( target nontarget ) . 8 . Lesion locate within 2 mm origin LAD LCX . 9 . Extreme angulation ( ≥ 90 ° ) excessive tortuosity ( ≥ two 45° angle ) proximal within target lesion . 10 . Heavy calcification proximal within target lesion . 11 . Target vessel contains thrombus indicate angiographic image . 12 . Target lesion high probability procedure predilatation stenting require time index procedure treatment target vessel ( e.g . rotablator , DCA , cut balloon ) . 13 . Target vessel previously treated* type PCI ( e.g . balloon angioplasty , stent , rotablator , DCA , cut balloon ) within 9 month index procedure . 14 . Nontarget vessel previously treat type PCI within 90 day index procedure . 15 . Additional clinically significant lesion ( ) target vessel side branch PCI may require within 90 day index procedure . Target lesion must separate ≥ 5 mm previously treat lesion ( stenosis within 5 mm previously treat lesion regard `` restenosis '' ) .
